title: MNA Zaib Jaffar calls on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 21 (APP): Member of the National Assembly Zaib Jaffar Tuesday called on Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif.
During the meeting, political situation in the country and the issues pertaining to her constituency were discussed.
Zaib Jaffar proposed for an extension of jail in Rahim Yar Khan whereas issues related to the promotion of girlsâ€™ education and climate change were also discussed.
Separately, Mehmood Bashir Virk, MNA, Zulfiqar Bhinder, MNA and Senator Afnan Ullah also called on the prime minister.
